subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Paralympic Games
Golf
lead_paragraph: A view of the day in sports, including Britain’s fond farewell to the Olympics and Paralympics and the continuation of an L.P.G.A. event that took nine playoff holes to settle.
snippet: A view of the day in sports, including Britain’s fond farewell to the Olympics and Paralympics and the continuation of an L.P.G.A. event that took nine playoff holes to settle.
